name: Rival Schools: United by Fate
description: Rival Schools: United by Fate (Japanese: 私立ジャスティス学園 LEGION OF HEROES, Hepburn: Shiritsu Justice Gakuen: Legion of Heroes, "Private Justice Academy: Legion of Heroes") is a competitive fighting game produced by Capcom originally released as an arcade game in 1997 and ported to the PlayStation in 1998. On February 23, 2012 Capcom released United by Fate on the Japanese PlayStation Network.
